LanguageData.CallLaborerGang.label: call laborer gang
LanguageData.CallLaborerGang.description: Call a group of 8 laborers to assist you for 4 days. These workers can only do general labor tasks. You can control them as though they were your own colonists. You are required to keep them safe.
LanguageData.CallLaborerTeam.label: call laborer team
LanguageData.CallLaborerTeam.description: Call a group of 4 laborers to assist you for 4 days. These workers can only do general labor tasks. You can control them as though they were your own colonists. You are required to keep them safe.
LanguageData.CallMilitaryAidGrand.label: カタフラクト部隊を呼ぶ
LanguageData.CallMilitaryAidGrand.description: Call a group of 4 heavy cataphracts to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.CallMilitaryAidLarge.label: イェニチェリ部隊を呼ぶ
LanguageData.CallMilitaryAidLarge.description: Call a group of 4 professional janissaries to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.CallMilitaryAidSmall.label: トルーパーを呼ぶ
LanguageData.CallMilitaryAidSmall.description: Call a group of 4 light troopers to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.CallOrbitalSalvo.label: call orbital salvo
LanguageData.CallOrbitalSalvo.description: Call an extended salvo of orbital strikes around a target position.
LanguageData.CallOrbitalStrike.label: call orbital strike
LanguageData.CallOrbitalStrike.description: Call a single-impact orbital strike at a target position.
LanguageData.CallTransportShuttle.label: call transport shuttle
LanguageData.CallTransportShuttle.description: Call a shuttle for your own use. It will transport colonists, items, and animals anywhere you like within 70 world tiles.
LanguageData.TradeCaravan.label: キャラバンと取引をする
LanguageData.TradeOrbital.label: 軌道貿易商と取引をする
LanguageData.TradeSettlement.label: 入植者と取引をする
